text: José Roberto Figueroa Padilla, also known as Macho, (15 December 1959 – 24 May 2020) was a Honduran footballer. He played as a forward, in Honduras for F.C. Motagua, C.D.S. Vida and in Spain for Real Murcia and Hércules CF. He also represented Honduras at the 1982 FIFA World Cup. Figueroa was born in Olanchito, Honduras. He died on 24 May 2020 in San Francisco, California of cardiac arrest, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Acciones de jugadores hondureños – Nación Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Honduran footballers
title: José Roberto Figueroa
